name: Nature's Feast Food and Grocery Suppliers
tag_list: grocery, online-shopping, health, beauty, stationary, adaptive, technology, home-delivery
overview:
Enjoyable Online Grocery, Health & Beauty and Stationary Shopping!

Four IIT brains supporting Nature’s Feast India to implement Hybrid retail model in India especially in the zones of Wal-Mart & Amazon.

Our two years customer focused research aims at creating ‘Integrated Multi Channel Retailing’ Model for providing best service to people. We aim to help consumers save more money and enjoy shopping by introducing ‘Adaptive Technology ‘ & ‘Hybrid Retail System’.

Nature’s Feast India’s enjoyable online shopping Portal www.naturesfeast.in provides wide range of online products in Vegetables, Fruits, Bakery & Milk products, Everyday grocery like Staples/wheat/Rice, Beverages, Detergents and Soaps, World Foods, Baby Care, Health & Beauty Range, School & Office Stationary. Our virtual Store offers user friendly search options to choose either by your favorite brand, category or specific item name. We are associated with most popular brands & committed to provide best quality items to our consumers.

Auto Subscription Based delivery for Grocery, vegetables, Fruits, Meat, Fish, Frozen foods on preferred slots. Recurring orders benefits Reliable grocery delivery service to your home or office Personalized shopping lists Faster checkout facility Flexible payment options(Credit card/Debit card/Netbanking/Cash on Delivery/Swipe on delivery) In line with Comprehensive E-commerce portal, Our Hybrid Retail model is just getting closer to you in your neighborhoods & communities from April 2013 Onward. This Multi channel retail environment facilitates supply from your morning tea till good night dinner with enhanced customer service across channels. We are reaching every corner of India creating 1,00,00+ jobs within next 18 Months Span operating in both B2C & B2B segment. Our B2B associates get value for investment & earn with peaceful mind.

Our widely connected network with direct farmer’s community, organic food producers, best quality food product suppliers, top nutritionists helps us in supplying fresh food directly to our consumers. Currently we have joined hands with 300 farmers soon expanding our reach to 10,000+ farmers.

We are starting our operations in Pune soon expanding to Mumbai, Nagpur, Ahmadabad, Baroda, Jaipur, Lucknow, Chandigarh, Dehradun, Kanpur, Patna, Ranchi, Kolkata, Guwahati, Bhubaneswar, Vijayawada, Hyderabad, Chennai, Coimbatore, Trivandrum, Cochin, Bangalore, Indore, Bhopal, Raipur, Ludhiana, Ghaziabad, Noida, Gurgaon, Surat.

We look forward to your continued support in this mission. If you want to cooperate us in technology, product sourcing, operations, Logistics, Finance, Real Estate, Farming, Legal, Media, and Investment, partners / Associates You are most welcome. Get in touch at support@naturesfeast.in.

We have bigger plans in the pipeline which you can surely keep yourself updated about by subscribing to us. You can get in touch with us here.

Our Registration started for Pune, Mumbai, Bangalore, Hyderabad and Delhi. To become an registered member, avail our early invite offers by mailing at info@naturesfeast.in with Subject line ‘Registration for [Your City Name].’

Want to receive our exclusive savings, hear the latest news and find out interesting facts about food? Follow us on Twitter, ‘Like’ our Facebook page and read our Blog and you’ll never miss out!

"Grocery shopping becomes affordable & convenient for tech-savvy PUNEites
